bibl.title: The Ioudaion telesma in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Abstract of a paper presented at 37th Annual Meeting. "This study supports the view of Wessely (S.P.P. IV, 60) that the Ioudaion telesma attested in Egypt from A.D. 71/2 to 116, was the same tax as the didrachmon, or temple-tax of the Jews…"
bibl.seg: Wallace Sherman LeRoy, The Ioudaion telesma in Roman Egypt.

Abstract of a paper presented at 37th Annual Meeting. "This study supports the view of Wessely (S.P.P. IV, 60) that the Ioudaion telesma attested in Egypt from A.D. 71/2 to 116, was the same tax as the didrachmon, or temple-tax of the Jews…"
